text: @SpeakerPelosi Shame on Pelosi and the Dems for even considering another impeachment in the middle of a national/global emergency!! Goes to show their minds are on winning 2020 not helping the nation go through COVID19. Probably have their OUTRAGEOUS wish list ready for the next stimulus.
